title: Stuck Reconnecting to a Game that Finished
body:
Group of friends and myself played a 5v5 normal game. I was Morgana jungle (12-4-17). The game finished and now we are all stuck. It is like the game didn't finish as my client keeps trying to reconnect me to the game but I keep getting a message "Failed to Reconnect" 

What is going on?

replies.body: We've been seeing an abnormal amount of these ghost games over the past two days, but they do seem to be clearing up after enough time. This happens because the server never actually told your client that the match was over, which is why it keeps trying to reconnect but there's just no game to connect to. Have you been able to get back into a game yet?
Having the same issue except it was from a solo queue match every time I restart the client it just auto tries to reconnect and says i'm in game when i know it's over
